alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:53AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Itasca and southern Koochiching Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 150 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles west of Nett Lake, to 8 miles east of Waskish, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mizpah and Gemmell around 210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Northome and Togo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central and northeastern Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca
